EmailTemplate.description: Notification of new password when a user’s password is reset (because they forgot it)
EmailTemplate.name: 2D. Communities: Forgot Password Email - Custom
EmailTemplate.subject: Your new Adaptive Insights Partner Community password
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for registering for the Adaptive Insights Partner Community!
We’ve evaluating your application and a member of our team will be in touch with you shortly.
If need any assistance, please connect with us at partners@adaptiveinsights.com
The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
